    • Move

      public static boolean Move​(Worker worker, int row, int column, GameBoard board)
      When a Player wants to move on his worker in a near cell, choose his worker and a cell
      Parameters:
      worker - worker to move
      board - GameBoard
      row - which row in GameBoard
      column - which column in GameBoard
      Returns:
      true if the movement has occurred, otherwise false
